main-page.buses_title: Bus tickets across Ukraine and Europe
main-page.buses_description: GreenBus provides a convenient service for travelers who value their time. We aggregate offers from hundreds of carriers, allowing you to compare prices, check up-to-date schedules, and book seats online. Travel comfortably between Ukrainian cities or plan your big trip to Europe with us.
main-page.сarriers_description: We partner only with verified companies. Compare ratings, read real reviews, and choose the best service at the best price.
main-page.popular_button_title: View all available bus routes across Ukraine and Europe
main-page.get_started_description: Organize your trip in a few clicks. Our interactive map helps you choose a route, compare travel times, and check comfort levels. Add stopovers and build the perfect path through your favorite cities.
main-page.questions_description: Answers to key questions about booking, luggage, and travel. Can't find what you need? Our support is always online.
main-page.payment_description: Buy bus tickets online 24/7. Forget about ticket offices — your digital ticket is ready on your smartphone.
main-page.destinations_description: Business or travel — find the perfect route. Choose from over 50,000 bus schedules for any destination.
main-page.secure_description: Your data is fully protected. We use international PCI DSS standards for safe bus ticket booking.
main-page.refunds_description: Plans changed? Refund your bus tickets quickly via your personal account without hassle or calls.
